steps.intro: Click here to create a new item in your Omeka S collection.
When you click this button, you'll be taken to the item creation form where you can add metadata, files, and other information.
Choose a resource template to load a predefined set of metadata fields tailored to the type of item you are creating.
Select the resource class to categorize this item (for example: Document, Image, or Physical Object).
Start by entering a title for your item. This is the main identifier that will appear in search results and item listings.
Add a description to provide more details about your item. You can use multiple description fields if needed.
Use the Media section to upload or link the files that belong to this item. Each media entry can have its own metadata.
